revised_title: Advanced Materials and Technology Transfer in the 1990s: The Role of Defence Research in Electronic Materials
tldr: This article discusses the transfer of defence research on electronic materials to the civil field, focusing on the Royal Signals and Radar Establishment's (RSRE) contributions. The article highlights various examples of successful technology transfers, such as liquid crystals, semiconductors, and materials processing, and outlines the benefits of these transfers to the UK economy. It also describes the role of collaboration between defence research establishments and civil organizations in fostering commercial exploitation of research work.
